name: Edge Swinger
description:
You take on the role of a spider falling from a floating island embarking in the never ending journey of swinging from branch to branch while trying to web up as many flies as possible. 

This was a small project made in 3 days for the Mini Jam game jam with web as its theme and a limitation of having no ground.

The game is most certainly lacking content but we still hope you enjoy this project of ours.
